Only a 10 min walk from the main pier in Thong Sala or a 2 minute taxi ride. The bay is the first on the road to Haad Yao, northwest of Thong Sala.

value: directions=on the coast line north of Thong Sala, just after the muay Thai training stadium, inside Baan Manali Resort
content= A little sailing school, with windsurfing, paddle boards, kayaking, and Hobie 16 catamarans.
content=Under a coconut plantation in front of the lagoon facing the sunset, this is a place to relax and refuel. The resort restaurant,
, serves traditional, exotic & original recipes. Most of the food, like jams, yoghurt, bread, muesli, coconut milk, ice cream, is home made. Excellent breakfast.
